title: Bug 49536 - No content is displayed and HTTP code 200 is returned when accessing a URL in Tomcat 7 with no webapps deployed
OB: When accessing a URL in Tomcat 7 with no webapps deployed, the system returns an HTTP code 200 OK with no content instead of an HTTP error 404.
EB: When accessing a URL in Tomcat 7 with no webapps deployed, I expect the system to return an HTTP error 404.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Download http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip. 2. Start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed. 3. Access a URL in the Tomcat 7 instance.
